<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3dev

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current environment volume (set by [[fadeEnvironment]])

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''environmentVolume'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[environmentVolume]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fadeEnvironment]], [[musicVolume]], [[soundVolume]], [[radioVolume]], [[speechVolume]], [[getAudioOptionVolumes]], [[environmentEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
